original_title: The Curse of the Screaming Dead
overview: A group of six friends are out in the rural south on a deer hunt when they start hearing strange noises coming from the woods. An investigation of the sounds leads them to an old Confederate graveyard, which suddenly begins sprouting Rebel zombies. Like the living dead in every other movie, these zombies are hungry for human flesh and soon set to chowing down on the hapless hunters.
tagline: The South Shall Rise Againâ€¦and Again...And Again
title: The Curse of the Screaming Dead
